column4: when i want to use mplayer i have to deactivate sound in gnome, how do i make mplayer not wanting the ethinre soundcoar for itself?
use a sound daemon like ESD
do i have to setup mplayer.conf or change the default soundriver for my system?
if you have a ~/.mplayer.conf that will override the system settings
i do but changeing ao=esd does not help, on term it still says something about alsa and the video does not start before i deactivate sound in gnome
can you msg me the exact error?
i dont ge an error, the last output from term is AF_pre: af format: 2 bps, 1 ch, 44100 hz, little endian signed int
should i post it in the pastebin too?
that would imply that it's still using alsa
mplayer -ao esd somemovie.mpg work:D how do i make it default?
the one in your ~/ has a higher priority
